mapper.sql: d.id as id, d.wine_cellar_activity_id as wine_cellar_activity_id, d.prod_id as prod_id, d.prod_sku_id as prod_sku_id, d.winery_voucher_id as winery_voucher_id, d.present_type as present_type, d.present_remark as present_remark, d.sort as sort, d.create_date as create_date, d.modify_date as modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into b_wine_cellar_activity_detail (id, wine_cellar_activity_id, prod_id, prod_sku_id, winery_voucher_id, present_type, present_remark, sort, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{wineCellarActivityId}, #{prodId}, #{prodSkuId}, #{wineryVoucherId}, #{presentType}, #{presentRemark}, #{sort}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update b_wine_cellar_activity_detail
wine_cellar_activity_id = #{wineCellarActivityId},
prod_id = #{prodId},
prod_sku_id = #{prodSkuId},
winery_voucher_id = #{wineryVoucherId},
present_type = #{presentType},
present_remark = #{presentRemark},
sort = #{sort},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select d.id,s.sku_name skuName,s.sku_sell_price skuSellPrice,i.img_addrr imgAddrr,d.present_type presentType from b_wine_cellar_activity_detail d inner join s_prod_sku s on d.prod_sku_id = s.id inner join s_prod_img i on i.prod_id = d.prod_id where d.wine_cellar_activity_id=#{wineCellarActivityId} order by d.sort asc

select s.sku_name skuName,d.id,d.prod_id prodId,d.detail_title detailTitle,d.detail_brief detailBrief,d.detail_img detailImg from s_prod_sku s inner join s_prod_detail d on s.prod_id =d.prod_id where s.id = #{id} and d.detail_status=2 order by d.sort
